logicalColumns.name: Cycle Time

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  NOT %1 IN ('01-Jan-1901', '31-Dec-4712') AND  NOT %2 IN ('01-Jan-1901', '31-Dec-4712') THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %2, %1) END
